name: Tabletop Soccer (itch)
description:
Tabletop Soccer is a  local multiplayer football game.

The ball is replaced by a dice, and the game is meant to be played from 2 to 6 players. The game was made in 50 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

The team was composed of 8 very dedicated people!
Maxence DELACROIX
Iris PECQUET
Eloïse ZIROTTI
Kryse (Instagram - ArtStation)
Adrien FEUGERE
RoPo
Guillaume VANUXEM
Robin SIX
